name: Shape Size Calculator
author: Ravi Yadav

sections.description: I have created this plugin to calculate size like M,L,XL, XXL etc based on measurement of your Waist Size (cms) and Hip Size (cms). You can just drag or click on size meter and you can see the Standard Size according to your measurement.
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract plugin files to a wp-content/plugin directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the WordPress admin interface.
  3. Add this shortcode [shape-size-calculator] where you want to show Shape Size Calculator.
  4. Done!
sections.faq:
1) Can we use Shortcode [shape-size-calculator] more than one time on single page or post?
Ans : No, you can’t add this Shortcode more than one time on a single page or post.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Updated with latest version

1.0.0

  • First version of plugin.

short_description: This plugin is developed to calculate custom size. Use this shortcode [shape-size-calculator] to show Size Calculator.
